Package edu.ncsu.csc216.pack_scheduler.course

Class Course

java.lang.Object
edu.ncsu.csc216.pack_scheduler.course.Activity
edu.ncsu.csc216.pack_scheduler.course.Course
All Implemented Interfaces:
Conflict, Comparable<Course>
public class Course extends Activity implements Comparable<Course>
This is a class that handles the course objects. It contains the setters, getters, equals and hash code methods for the Course objects. The equals and hashCode methods have been overridden to not compare start and end time of the courses. The constructors have been updated to reduce redundant code . This class extends to its super class that is Activity
Author:
Arnav Ganguly

      public Course(String name, String title, String section, int credits, String instructorId, int enrollmentCap, String meetingDays, int startTime, int endTime)
      Constructs a Course object with values for all fields.
      Parameters:
      name - name of Course
      title - title of Course
      section - section of Course
      credits - credit hours for Course
      instructorId - instructor's unity id
      enrollmentCap - the cap for enrollment
      meetingDays - meeting days for Course as series of chars
      startTime - start time for Course
      endTime - end time for Course

    • setMeetingDaysAndTime

      public void setMeetingDaysAndTime(String meetingDays, int startTime, int endTime)
      This is the method that overrides the setMeetingDaysAndTime in Activity to suit the requirements for the Course object, as separate checks are required by Event and Course objects.
      Overrides:
      setMeetingDaysAndTime in class Activity
      Parameters:
      meetingDays - is the details for the meeting days
      startTime - is the time the class starts
      endTime - is the time the class ends

      IllegalArgumentException - if the parameter entered is invalid or doesn't meet requirements

    • compareTo

      public int compareTo(Course o)
      Compares an Object to this Course to check if equal, greater than or less than
      Specified by:
      compareTo in interface Comparable<Course>
      Parameters:
      o - the object to compare 'this' to
      Returns:
      0 if the two objects are equal, -1 if the given object is less than this Course, or 1 if the given object is greater than this Course
      Throws:
      NullPointerException - if the object o is null
      ClassCastException - if the given object is not a course
